name: Hole the Map
description:
In  this game you have a pistol which can spawn holes from different colors. You have to help the character to pass the levels. The hole atracts the obstacles with the same color as the hole. You can also make the character to jump.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

space  - Jump

1 - change the hole you want to spawn to blue

2 - change the hole you want to spawn to green

3 - change the hole you want to spawn to red

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was initialy made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1 but I didn't have the time to finishit in time. However I wanted to finish it and this is what I did.
